events.strapline: Artist Andy Holden and his ornithologist father Peter take us on a journey from nest-building to egg-collecting. Or is it the other way around?
events.name: Natural Selection

images.title: Masters of Japanese Prints: Nature and seasons
images.name: Natural Selection

events.strapline: The second part of the exhibition considers the psychology of egg collecting and how the desire to possess something rare can sometimes have terrible consequences.

events.strapline: Drop-in and hear about William Hogarth?s vast Ascension triptych and its remarkable journey around Bristol since it was painted for St Mary Redcliffe in 1755/56.
events.priceDetails: St Nicholas Church, St Nicholas St, Bristol, BS1 1UE.
events.name: William Hogarth's Triptych for St Mary Redcliffe, Bristol
events.description: a one-day conference, part of the British Art Network seminars, held at St Nicholas Church and Bristol Museum & Art Gallery, subtitled 'How to Deal with Enormous Artworks in Public Collections'.
